entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
